question: Which of the following is NOT a reason for personal selling to be used?

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Personal selling is used in situations when the product his highly technical and requires education and demonstration.

answers.text: When the product has a lot of competition

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Personal selling is a one-on-one activity used when the product needs explanation and demonstration.

answers.text: When the product needs to be demonstrated

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Personal selling is often used when the product is complex and requires education and explanation.

answers.text: When the product is highly technical

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Most products in the market have a lot of competition. The level of competition has nothing to do with the use of personal selling.

detailedSolution: Most products in the market have a lot of competition. The level of competition has nothing to do with the use of personal selling.
